title: Verify dlp sends encrypted file to drm even when non label based dlp profile configured
custom_steps:
Credit card use case

Configure dip profile with credit card
Upload an encrypted file which has the credit card detail
Check the policy hits - it should send to drm and hit the policy despite no label related policy
custom_expected:
Before this feature dip won’t. Read an encrypted file
Check the policy hits - it should send to drm and hit the policy despite no label related policy
